Dino Riki 2021 VGS Weekly Contest

Game: Adventures of Dino Riki
Published on Mon Oct 18 2021

I'm always happy to see Dino Riki appear on the VGS Weekly NES Contest, so when it popped up I decided to give it a few playthroughs.

I didn't end up 1-life clearing it, too busy with work, but I got to the last level on one life and got a half-decent score. I'll probably play a few more for high score now that the contest is over.
